des:
WHY CHOOSE RELAXING SLEEP SOUNDS: STORM SOUNDS

- 5 hours enhanced looping included FREE!
- High-Quality Stereo audio included for FREE (Premium Quality)!
- Fantastic paid version available.

GOLD EDITION

- Loop free audio that plays through the entire night
- Premium sound quality
- Super Enhanced looping: 12-hour audio

FREE VERSION

- 5+ hour audio (most free skills offer 1 hour)
- Loop setting
- High-Quality Stereo Audio

GETTING STARTED

- Enable this skill by clicking the yellow enable button above and then say, "Alexa, open storm sounds."

Consider rating Relaxing Sleep sounds: Storm Sounds; if you have any sound recommendations, feedback, or questions, contact me at [relaxingsleep.alexa@gmail.com](mailto:relaxingsleep.alexa@gmail.com).

If you enjoy this Sleep Sound Skill, please check out my others!
